description: Descent 2 is the 1996 sequel to the original Descent. It stores its game data in a variety of files, including .HOG , .PIG , .POG , and HAM files.

HAM files are stored inside HOG files, and they control how various objects, enemies, and weapons behave in-game. Descent 2 modders can use custom level creators to create their own HAM files, as well as .HXM files.

common_filenames.description: Descent2.ham - Controls enemy, weapon, and object behavior at a game-wide level
